item.title: China’s AI Stocks With Killer Apps are Winning Investor Favor
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- As China’s homegrown artificial intelligence boom enters its second year, investors are piling into shares of companies with killer apps in a hunt for earnings that justify surging valuations. Kuaishou Technology has seen its stock climb 26% so far this year as its AI video-generatio...
